p.i: A black leather robe with a shadowed cowl and clawed clasps on thin, mithral chains.

description.p: Benefit. Only a wizard with the Sorcerer title can wear this robe. Your unarmored AC becomes 15 plus your Dexterity modifier.
Benefit. When you cast a spell that deals damage, add your Intelligence modifier to the total.
Benefit. You have advantage on casting the power word kill spell.
